Subject: Re: Terrorcons
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Wildrider looked at them perplexed, then thought for a second. These guys
where perfect for the trouble they were having right now. "Hung-grr, we had
a prisoner, but he escaped, he is still nearby, and last we saw him, he was
at those bushes," he finishes his sentence as he points to the bushes a bit
away.
